page.title: 14HOUSING - OWERSBY
page.content: Of the 74 houses in this block 45 are in the village of Nth.Owersby.Once an estate village,the older houses are of local yellow brick,including what was the village school.Alongside these the council owns 2 bungalows and 18 houses 5 of which are being bought by their occupants.Outside the village many of the dwellings are farmhouses and their cottages.The district council policy is for practically no growth in the next few years,allowing infilling only within the village and elsewhere the yardstick is genuine agricultural need only.Thus the only building this year is a bungalow on an empty plot in the main village street.3 properties have been offered for sale-a modern farm- house with farm buildings and 7 acres of land at Â£76,000,a 3 bedroomed house in the village at Â£32,000 & renovated cottage on an outlying farm for Â£36000
